00011 // Standard includes
00012 #include <ServiceControl/UserFriendlyAPI.h>
00013
00014 // Add local class RegisterThread
00015 #include "RegisterThread.h"
00016
00017 using namespace std;
00018
00019 using namespace Omiscid;
00020
00021 /* @brief Usage function */
00022 void RegisterAndSearchUsage(char * ProgramName)
00023 {
00024     OmiscidError( "%s is used to demonstrate register and search methods using OMiSCID.\n", ProgramName );
00025     OmiscidError( "Usage: %s [-n <Number of services>]\n", ProgramName );
00026     OmiscidError( "Default option values:\n" );
00027     OmiscidError( "               -n <Number of services>: from 2 to 100 services. Default is 20.\n" );
00028     exit(-1);
00029 }
00030
00031 /* @brief main program entry. No need to give parameter */
00032 int main(int argc, char*argv[] )
00033 {
00034     unsigned int i;
00035     int j;
00036
00037     // Constant values
00038     // The number of service to register
00039     unsigned int NumberOfServicesToRegister = 10;
00040
00041     // A variable to store pointers on RegisterThread
00042     RegisterThread * pRegThread;
00043
00044     // parsing parameters, 0 is the program name
00045     for( j = 1 ; j < argc; j++ )
00046     {
00047         if ( argv[j][0] != '-' )
00048         {
00049             OmiscidError( "Bad parameter '%s'. See Usage :\n\n", argv[j] );
00050             RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00051         }
00052
00053         // Do the user ask for help
00054         if ( strcmp( argv[j], "-h" ) == 0 ||
00055              strcmp( argv[j], "-help" ) == 0 ||
00056              strcmp( argv[j], "--help" ) == 0 )
00057         {
00058             RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00059         }
00060
00061         // Check the number of services
00062         if ( strcmp( argv[j], "-n" ) == 0 )
00063         {
00064             j++;
00065             if ( j >= argc )
00066             {
00067                 OmiscidError( "Missing parameter value for '%s' option. See Usage :\n\n", argv[j-1] );
00068                 RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00069             }
00070             if ( sscanf( argv[j], "%d", &NumberOfServicesToRegister ) != 1 )
00071             {
00072                 OmiscidError( "Bad parameter value '%s' for '%s' option. See Usage :\n\n", argv[j], argv[j-1] );
00073                 RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00074             }
00075             if ( NumberOfServicesToRegister < 2 || NumberOfServicesToRegister > 100 )
00076             {
00077                 OmiscidError( "You must set the number of service from 2 and to 100 maximum. See Usage:\n\n" );
00078                 RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00079             }
00080
00081             continue;
00082         }
00083
00084         OmiscidError( "Bad parameter '%s'. See Usage :\n\n", argv[j] );
00085         RegisterAndSearchUsage(argv[0]);
00086     }
00087
00088     // A simple list to store RegisterThread objects
00089     SimpleList<RegisterThread*> ListOfRegisterThreads;
00090
00091     // Variables to Compute Statics
00092     unsigned int EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices = 0;
00093
00094     // Print Welcome message
00095     OmiscidMessage( "This program is used to demonstrate register and search methods using OMiSCID.\n" );
00096     OmiscidMessage( "As it is ditributed, registering unique service and searching for services\n" );
00097     OmiscidMessage( "is a huge processing. See Accumulator/ClientAccumator examples for communication schema.\n\n" );
00098
00099     OmiscidMessage( "** Session parameters **\n"  );
00100     OmiscidMessage( "Number of service to register %d\n** **\n\n", NumberOfServicesToRegister );
00101
00102 // Register services
00103     OmiscidMessage( "Start to register services.\n" );
00104
00105 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_AVAHI
00106     if ( NumberOfServicesToRegister >= 10 )
00107     {
00108         OmiscidMessage( "WARNING: Avahi may crash when regestering many service in the same process\n");
00109     }
00110 #endif
00111 
00112     // Create an object to now when the total time
00113     // To register the services
00114     ElapsedTime TimeCounter;
00115
00116     for( i = 1; i <= NumberOfServicesToRegister; i++ )
00117     {
00118         // Create a new register service called
00119         pRegThread = new OMISCID_TLM RegisterThread(i);
00120         // if ok
00121         if ( pRegThread )
00122         {
00123             // add it to my list of threads
00124             ListOfRegisterThreads.Add( pRegThread );
00125         }
00126     }
00127
00128     // Get number of waited services
00129     EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices = ListOfRegisterThreads.GetNumberOfElements();
00130
00131     // Wait until all registered services are present
00132     OmiscidMessage( "Wait for service to be ready.\n" );
00133     for(;;)
00134     {
00135         // Wait for all create thread to register their service
00136         if ( (unsigned int)RegisterThread::NbRegistered == EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices )
00137         {
00138             break;
00139         }
00140
00141         // If not done, wait 10 ms maximum for a new service registration
00142         RegisterThread::NewServiceIsRegistered.Wait(10);
00143     }
00144
00145     OmiscidMessage( "=> %d service(s) are registered in %u ms.\n", EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices, TimeCounter.Get() );
00146
00147 // Search for services, *can be done* in another process/computer over the network obvioulsly !
00148
00149     // First, in order to serach for service, we need to create a service event if it is
00150     // not register. This service will ne be visible.
00151     Service * Searcher = ServiceFactory.Create( "Searcher" );
00152
00153     if ( Searcher == NULL )
00154     {
00155         // print there is a problem
00156         OmiscidError( "Problem creating 'Searcher' service.\n" );
00157
00158         // Free all registred service
00159         // 1er way to walk among the SimpleList
00160         while( ListOfRegisterThreads.GetNumberOfElements() != 0 )
00161         {
00162             // Get and remove the first element in the list
00163             // and it can not be NULL, delete it
00164             delete ListOfRegisterThreads.ExtractFirst();
00165
00166             exit(-1);
00167         }
00168     }
00169
00170 // First, search only one service named RegisterThread and get a ServiceProxy for it
00171     OmiscidMessage( "Search for single RegisterThread service.\n" );
00172
00173     // Reinit ElapsedTime object
00174     TimeCounter.Reset();
00175
00176     // Search for a service, wait at max 5 s (5000 ms) to get an answer. We provide
00177     // A filter (automatically create by NameIs and automatically destroyed by FindService
00178     ServiceProxy * OneService = Searcher->FindService(NameIs("RegisterThread"), 5000);
00179
00180     if ( OneService != NULL )
00181     {
00182         OmiscidMessage( "=> service 'RegisterThread' found in %u ms.\n", TimeCounter.Get() );
00183
00184         // Delete
00185         delete OneService;
00186     }
00187     else
00188     {
00189         OmiscidError( "=> service 'RegisterThread' not found.\n" );
00190     }
00191
00192 // Now Search for all services named RegisterThread and get a ServiceProxyList for Them
00193     OmiscidMessage( "Search all services named RegisterThread.\n" );
00194
00195     // We need to a filters list, give a NameIs filter for each service
00196     ServiceFilterList ListOfFilters;
00197     for( i = 1; i <= EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices; i++ )
00198     {
00199         ListOfFilters.Add( NameIs("RegisterThread") );
00200     }
00201
00202     // Reset time counter
00203     TimeCounter.Reset();
00204     // Search for services, wait forever (no second parameter given) to get an answer
00205     // Get in return a ServiceProxy List
00206     ServiceProxyList * MultipleServices = Searcher->FindServices( ListOfFilters /*, 0 = default */ );
00207
00208     // MultipleServices != NULL can not be null as we do not got out of FindServices without
00209     // an answer
00210     OmiscidMessage( "=> services found in %u ms.\n", TimeCounter.Get() );
00211
00212     // Delete answer
00213     delete MultipleServices;
00214
00215     // Empty the filter list to reset it
00216     ListOfFilters.Empty();
00217
00218 // Now Search for all services named RegisterThread with a pair number and get a ServiceProxyList for Them
00219     OmiscidMessage( "Search for all RegisterThread services with a pair number.\n" );
00220
00221     // We need to a filters list, give a NameIs filter for each service
00222     for( i = 2; i <= EffectiveNumberOfRegisteredServices; i += 2 )
00223     {
00224         ListOfFilters.Add( And(NameIs("RegisterThread"),HasVariable("Number",i)) );
00225     }
00226
00227     // Reset time counter
00228     TimeCounter.Reset();
00229     // Search for services, wait forever (no second parameter given) to get an answer
00230     // Get in return a ServiceProxy List
00231     MultipleServices = Searcher->FindServices( ListOfFilters /*, 0 = default */ );
00232
00233     // MultipleServices != NULL can not be null as we do not got out of FindServices without
00234     // an answer
00235     OmiscidMessage( "=> services found in %u ms.\n", TimeCounter.Get() );
00236
00237     // Print information about found service
00238     for( MultipleServices->First(); MultipleServices->NotAtEnd(); MultipleServices->Next() )
00239     {
00240         // in order to write shorter lines below
00241         ServiceProxy * pProxy = MultipleServices->GetCurrent();
00242         cerr << pProxy->GetName() << " (" << pProxy->GetPeerIdAsString() << ") is number "
00243              << pProxy->GetVariableValue("Number") << endl;
00244     }
00245
00246 // Now Search for specific service which is not a specific one
00247     MultipleServices->First();
00248     OmiscidMessage( "Search for single RegisterThread which is not %8.8x.\n", MultipleServices->GetCurrent()->GetPeerId() );
00249
00250     // Reset time counter
00251     TimeCounter.Reset();
00252     // Search for services, wait forever (no second parameter given) to get an answer
00253     // Get in return a ServiceProxy List
00254     OneService = Searcher->FindService( Not(MultipleServices->GetCurrent()) );
00255
00256     // MultipleServices != NULL can not be null as we do not got out of FindServices without
00257     // an answer
00258     OmiscidMessage( "=> service %8.8x found in %u ms.\n", OneService->GetPeerId(), TimeCounter.Get() );
00259
00260     // Delete last ServiceProxy
00261     delete OneService;
00262
00263     // Delete answer
00264     delete MultipleServices;
00265
00266     // printf use for autotest
00267     printf( "Test ok.\n" );
00268     fflush( stdout );
00269
00270 // Unregister service and close all connections
00271     OmiscidMessage( "Unregister service and close all connections.\n" );
00272     // Reset time counter
00273     TimeCounter.Reset();
00274     // Delete registered thread
00275     while( ListOfRegisterThreads.IsNotEmpty() )
00276     {
00277         delete ListOfRegisterThreads.ExtractFirst();
00278     }
00279     OmiscidMessage( "=> done in %u ms.\n", TimeCounter.Get() );
00280
00281     // delete the Search service
00282     delete Searcher;
00283
00284 #ifdef WIN32
00285     // Create an even in order to Stop here forever
00286     Event Forever;
00287     Forever.Wait();
00288 #endif
00289 
00290     // exit
00291     return 0;
00292 }
